comment.author: 73746489@N07
comment._content: Mr. Rolf's business prospered unto the present day; Rolf Griffin Heating & Air Conditioning fixed my furnace in January of 2010.  It is now Branch #008 of the Service Experts chain.

comment.author: 37784107@N08
comment._content: Great information, thanks for passing this along! I just looked up the Rolf Griffin Service Experts branch in Ft. Wayne, Indiana. It's fascinating that they're still doing business!
